# HIVEMIND Worker Client

Worker node that contributes compute resources to HIVEMIND network.

## Usage

```bash
npm install --production
npm start
```

## Features

- Connects to HIVEMIND server
- Executes AI tasks
- Sandboxed execution
- Credit earning

## Requirements

- Node.js 18+
- 4GB RAM minimum
- Docker (optional, for sandboxing)

See README.md in parent folder for full documentation.
